wikipedia_page.main: Percy Oldacre (25 October 1892 – 26 January 1970) was an English footballer who played as a centre-forward for Stoke, Sheffield Wednesday, Exeter City, Castleford Town, Sheffield United, Halifax Town, Crewe Alexandra, Shrewsbury Town, Port Vale, and Hurst.
